## Part 1

```{r}
df <-
  read_delim(here::here("data/input/2021/02/01_input"),
    col_names = c("direction", "amount")
  )

res <- df %>%
  mutate(orientation = case_when(
    direction %in% c("up", "down") ~ "v",
    direction == "forward" ~ "h"
  )) %>%
  mutate(amount = ifelse(direction == "up", -amount, amount)) %>%
  group_by(orientation) %>%
  summarise(total_amout = sum(amount))

res

res %>%
  pull(total_amout) %>%
  prod()
```
